scripts.build:analyze: npm run build && npm run analyze
scripts.perf:test: npm run build && npm run preview & sleep 3 && npm run perf:audit
scripts.tauri:contractor: bash -c 'cp src-tauri/tauri.conf.json src-tauri/tauri.conf.json.bak && sed -i "" "s|\"title\": \"mobile-work-app\"|\"title\": \"HandyApp - Contractor\"|g" src-tauri/tauri.conf.json && APP_ROLE=contractor npm run tauri dev; mv src-tauri/tauri.conf.json.bak src-tauri/tauri.conf.json'
scripts.tauri:client: bash -c 'cp src-tauri/tauri.conf.json src-tauri/tauri.conf.json.bak && sed -i "" "s|\"title\": \"mobile-work-app\"|\"title\": \"HandyApp - Client\"|g" src-tauri/tauri.conf.json && sed -i "" "s|\"devUrl\": \"http://localhost:1420\"|\"devUrl\": \"http://localhost:1421\"|g" src-tauri/tauri.conf.json && APP_ROLE=client VITE_PORT=1421 npm run tauri dev; mv src-tauri/tauri.conf.json.bak src-tauri/tauri.conf.json'
scripts.test:all: npm run test:health && npm run test:setup && npm run test:performance && npm run test:ab
scripts.mobile:android:build-and-sign: npm run mobile:android:build-apk && npm run mobile:android:sign-apk
scripts.mobile:android:setup-signing:
cd src-tauri/gen/android && keytool -genkey -v -keystore debug.keystore -alias androiddebugkey -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 10000 -storepass android -keypass android -dname 'CN=Android Debug,O=Android,C=US' && echo 'storeFile=debug.keystore
keyAlias=androiddebugkey
storePassword=android
keyPassword=android' > keystore.properties
